Header.title: Cannabis therapy at the push of a button - simple and convenient
Header.subtitle: Simple, fast and reliable: With our service, you get your cannabis prescription conveniently from home

Top.title: Everything about medical cannabis!
Top.subtitle: Your prescription, your flower, your health â€“ all on one platform. CannabisRezepte24 offers you the holistic solution.

Card.title: Following please change the design such as Bloomwell the 4th sector (Are you looking for medical cannabis?)

Bottom.title: How do I start a treatment?
Bottom.subtitle: Our process is specifically designed to make your path to prescription as stress-free as possible.

first.title: Fill out questionnaire
first.subtitle: A medical questionnaire records your symptoms, previous therapies, and pre-existing conditions. This allows for creating an individual therapy recommendation.

second.title: Selection of cannabis flower
second.subtitle: Choose from a list of strains that is regularly updated. Our platform only shows you available strains to avoid delays.

third.title: Select preferred pharmacy
third.subtitle: Choose a pharmacy from our list or opt for a free pharmacy. Partner pharmacies guarantee fast delivery and high availability.

fourth.title: Medical review
fourth.subtitle: Your questionnaire is reviewed by a specialized doctor. If necessary, the doctor may ask additional questions or request a video consultation.

fifth.title: Prescription issuance
fifth.subtitle: Upon positive review, a private prescription will be issued. This will be delivered to you as an e-prescription or in paper form.

sixth.title: Prescription delivery
sixth.subtitle: If desired, we will send your prescription directly to a pharmacy so you don't have to worry about shipping.

Disease.title: What diseases can be treated with cannabis?

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subtitle: Here you'll find all necessary information. Do you have more questions? Then contact our support.
